remarks: The meet of a line (expressed with 2 atoms) and a lattice element. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-2012.)
statement:
2atjm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
2atjm.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
2atjm.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
2atjm.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2atjm.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2atjm $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ X e. B ) /\ ( P .<_ X /\ -. Q .<_ X ) ) -> ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ X ) = P ) $.
